greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f.: x + x^2 * Product_{n>=0} (1 + x^(2^n-1) + x^(2^n)).
comment: Apart from initial terms and offset, same as A160573, but has a slightly nice recurrence.
xref: Rows of triangle in A118977 converge to this.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 03 2009
